article_text:
Bernardsville, NJ (07924)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 88F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , rockaway township, brad seabury, morris county prosecutor frederic knapp, day top mendham, christ church rockaway township, marianne luconi, morris county heroin summit
article_metadata.author:
P.C. ROBINSON
Contributing Writer

og.description: ROCKAWAY TWP. – Just 37 days after her beloved 28-year-old son, Antonio, died from a heroin overdose, township resident Marianne Luconi was already on the anti-drug warpath.
og.title: 'Screaming' for an end
